body:
Hi Jill,


Yes, you want to talk to Rick Mistrick about this; "DAYSIM-PS" is being developed to (among other things) calculate the daylight metrics sDA and ASE as per LM-83. Also check in with Kevin Van Den Wymelenberg at IDL-Boise (http://www.idlboise.com/), as those guys developed a Python script a while back that would also do the calculations.


- Rob
___
